channel.title: Death glitch help
channel.description:
Hello, I've decided to try and make another server for fun. Since i haven't coded a server in like 4 years I've been running into all sorts of problems that I would have been able to fix before but now I am stuck.
One annoying problem I've been having while testing player vs player is that when one person dies, they go back to lumbridge and cannot move and have to log out and then back in to move or teleport anywhere. It looks like this:
[IMG]http://i85.photobucket.com/albums/k62/vancebla/Picture3.png[/img]
If anyone could help me fix this, it would be greatly appreciated :)
-Vance

item.title: Death glitch help

@Zaron wrote:

Damn, haha. Idk where to go from here D:

Read full topic

item.title: Death glitch help
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

I’ll just give you the whole rest on the code, and i’ll try and // those and see if that’s the problem.

if (deathStage == 2 && !IsInFightCave() && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 100) { if (isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) == true){ client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId]; killerz.ResetAttack(); if(isinsafewild() == false){ killerz.sM("You have defeated "+playerName+"."); killerz.rating += 1; if(killerz != null) if(playerRights < 2) if(tradeTimer == 0) youdied();} if(isinsafewild()){ if(killerz != null) {killerz.addItem(995,10000); killerz.sM("You have been giving some coins for defeating "+playerName+".");}} } } if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 100 && IsInFightCave()) { toX = 2439; toY = 5169; AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; specialAmount = 100; sM("Oh dear you have died!"); resetOtherAtk(); } if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 100 && !IsInFightCave()) { if(isinsafewild()){toX = 2445; toY = 5172;} else{ if(isInTutIsland()){toX = 3112; toY = 9519;} else{ if(deathloc == 1){toX = 3222; toY = 3218; updateRequired = true;} else{ if(deathloc == 2){toX = 2970; toY = 3341;} else{ if(deathloc == 3){toX = 3217; toY = 3434;} else{ toX = 3097; toY = 3471;} AtkPray = 0; StrPrayer = 0; DefPray = 0; RangePray = 0; MagePray = 0; PrayHeal = false; ProtItem = false; ProtMage = false; ProtRange = false; ProtMelee = false; Redemption = false; Retribution = false; Smite = false; isSkulled = false; lastSkull = 0; headIcon = 0; turnpray(); heightLevel = 0; currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints]; deathStage = 0; resetAnimation(); frame1(); prayOn = false; AntiTeleDelay = 0; EntangleDelay = 0; specialAmount = 100; sM("Oh dear you have died!"); resetOtherAtk(); if (destruct) { absX = 3210; absY = 3432; } savegame(false); } } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Death glitch help
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

What about deathStage = 2;
?
I don’t see anything wrong in that code besides two possible things.
Animation 2241 may freeze you, animations do that for a certain amount of frames.
Same with gfx 432, although I highly doubt it.

Read full topic

item.title: Death glitch help
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

This is my code for death:

	[code]// If killed apply dead
	if (deathStage == 1) {
		if (attacknpc > 0) { // was killed by a npc -bakatool
			server.npcHandler.ResetAttackPlayer(attacknpc);
		}
		updateRequired = true;
		ResetAttack();
		ResetAttackNPC();
		deathStage = 2;
		poisoned = false;
		poisonDmg = false;
		fighting = false;
		hits = 0;
		startAnimation(2241);
	  	stillgfx(432, absY, absX, 0, 0);
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		deathTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
		playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]);
		playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
		playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]);
		playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]);
		playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]);
		sendFrame126("Prayer: "+playerLevel[5]+"/"+getLevelForXP(playerXP[5])+"", 687);
		resetfollowers();
		refreshSkills();
		killMyNPCs();
		resetKnight();
		skulledBy = "";
    	}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Death glitch help

item.description:

Try to look for when it spawns you to that coordinate when you die. Then post the method that code is listed in. Will probably be located in Combat or something. Since it is delta it will probably be in the Client class…

item.title: Death glitch help
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

Pff. Mac.
JAYKAY!
anyways whats your source? Is i PI?
If so ill help you with one of your probs.

Src > Server > Config.java

Search

Entire code should look like so,

public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3095; // when dead respawn here public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3478;

Simply change the cords.

Read full topic
